title: Data Structures
description: Master essential data structures for efficient algorithms
introduction: Data structures are fundamental components for organizing and storing data efficiently. Understanding them is crucial for solving complex problems and optimizing code performance.

topics.name: Arrays
topics.description: Contiguous memory storage with index-based access

topics.name: Linked Lists
topics.description: Sequential data structure with dynamic memory allocation

topics.name: Stacks
topics.description: LIFO (Last In First Out) data structure

topics.name: Queues
topics.description: FIFO (First In First Out) data structure

topics.name: Trees
topics.description: Hierarchical data structure with nodes and edges

topics.name: Binary Search Trees
topics.description: Ordered binary tree for efficient searching

topics.name: Heaps
topics.description: Complete binary tree satisfying heap property

topics.name: Hash Tables
topics.description: Key-value pairs with O(1) average access time

topics.name: Graphs
topics.description: Vertices connected by edges for complex relationships

topics.name: Tries
topics.description: Tree-like structure for efficient string operations

concepts.name: Time Complexity
concepts.example:
O(1) - Constant time
O(log n) - Logarithmic time
O(n) - Linear time
